titleStmt.title: A sermon upon the resurrection preached before the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor, and Court of Aldermen, at St. Bride's Church, on Monday in Easter-week, April 9, 1694 / by Richard, Lord Bishop of Bath and Wells.
titleStmt.author: Kidder, Richard, 1633-1703.
